name: has-value
description: Returns true if a value exists, false if empty. Works with deeply nested values using object paths.

0.1.0.name: has-value
0.1.0.description: Returns true if a value exists, false if empty. Works for booleans, functions, numbers, strings, nulls, objects and arrays. Other libs do this, but I needed one that would optionally _not_ treat zero as empty. Also, this works with booleans and other valu
